item.title: How to Set Up a Raspberry Pi Cluster
item.description: Photo by Jonathan on Unsplash The full text of this article can be found on Medium. This article covers what you need to know to setup your own Raspberry Pi cluster, including you what you need to buy, how to install the OS and configure the Raspberry Pis, how to set up networking, and other things you need to know to sinplify ongoing administration and maintenance of the cluster.
